materials.content: Focus on Mechanics, Electromagnetism, and Modern Physics for the admission test. Strong problem-solving skills are crucial.

materials.title: Crash Course: Motion in a Straight Line

materials.content: Master the Periodic Table, Chemical Bonding, and Organic Chemistry basics. Reaction mechanisms are a high-yield topic.
Covers essential topics in Algebra, Geometry, and Trigonometry required for standardized admission tests.
Deep dive into Calculus (Differentiation, Integration) and Analytical Geometry, crucial for engineering and science admissions.
Improve your grammar, vocabulary, and reading comprehension. Practice with past admission test papers is key.
Focus on advanced composition, literature analysis and critical thinking skills.
Focus on Bengali literature and advanced grammar (ব্যাকরণ) as per the admission curriculum.
Study the history, geography, and current affairs of Bangladesh and the world. Essential for all admission faculties.
